name: DoubleDome ShopQuick Preview
author: DoubleDome Digital Marketing

sections.description:
The DoubleDome ShopQuick Preview plugin enhances user experience by allowing swift access to product details without the necessity of navigating to the full product page. With this feature, customers can conveniently preview essential product information through a popup window, eliminating the need for extensive browsing. Moreover, the seamless integration enables users to effortlessly add desired products to their cart directly from the preview popup, streamlining the shopping process and fostering efficiency.

PLUGIN FUNCTIONALITY

  1. User-friendly interface
  2. Enables users to view product details swiftly without the need to open the full product page.
  3. Add to cart option within the preview popup
  4. Fully responsive for desktop and mobile usability

Support

Do you have questions or issues with DoubleDome ShopQuick Preview by DoubleDome Digital Marketing Setup? Please send an email to pluginsupport@doubledome.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire doubledome-shopquick-preview folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What WordPress version is this Plugin compatible with?

  • DoubleDome ShopQuick Preview Plugin is compatible from WordPress 5.3 to 6.5.2

What WooCommerce version is this Plugin compatible with?

  • DoubleDome ShopQuick Preview Plugin is compatible from Woocommerce 4.0.0 to 8.7.0

Is it compatible with Astra theme?

  • Yes, DoubleDome ShopQuick Preview Plugin is compatible with Astra theme.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Tested and verified on WordPress 6.5.2 and Woocommerce 8.7.0.

1.0

  • Initial release of the plugin.
